verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Who am I that the highest King
would welcome me
I was lost but He brought me in
Oh His love for me
Oh His love for me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Who the Son sets free
oh is free indeed
I'm a child of God
yes I am

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Free at last He has ransomed me
His grace runs deep
While I was a slave to sin
Jesus died for me
Yes He died for me

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
In my Father's house
there's a place for me
I'm a child of God
yes I am

verse.name: b1a
verse.lines:
I am chosen not forsaken
I am who you say I am
You are for me not against me
I am who You say I am

verse.name: b1b
verse.lines:
I am who You say I am
Oh I am who You say I am
Yes I am who You say I am
